title: Beta Tickets Tab Toggle Enabled - Legacy view(default) Opt In
custom_preconds:
[BP-10489](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10489 ) / [BP-10596](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10596 )


GIVEN 'enable_tickets_beta' is set to true in the remote config console

Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: BetaTix configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "enable_tickets_beta" as true
6. Save changes.
7. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)



GIVEN the downloaded the Ballpark app [iOS]& [ANDROID] 13.0 or greater
NOTES:
* THIS ASSUMES LEGACY TICKETS TAB IS DESIRED AS DEFAULTn]
* As of iOS 13.0.0 (3305), TicketsLegacy is defaulted

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has tickets on their acct
WHEN user logs into BP app configured to LegacyTicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Legacy TicketTab icon in the bottom NavBar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to TicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Legacy Wallet View
AND the ticketed event is shown as a Wallet Card
AND Opt-in link* is present above the Wallet Card 

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps Opt-in link* to view the new TicketTab Redesign

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the view is updated to new TicketTab Upcoming view
AND the ticketed event is shown within Upcoming view

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user does NOT have tickets on their acct
WHEN user logs into BP app configured to LegacyTicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Legacy TicketTab icon in the bottom NavBar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to TicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Legacy Wallet View
AND 'Cannot find any ticket's is shown in the middle of the page
AND 'Verify Email Address' and 'Refresh My Tickets' buttons are show (order of buttons are dependent of acct state - verified vs unverified)
AND Opt-in link* is present

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps Opt-in link* to view the new TicketTab Redesign

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the view is updated to new TicketTab Upcoming view
AND No Upcoming events is shown within Upcoming view

title: Beta Tickets Tab Toggle Enabled - Opt Out (return to Legacy)
custom_preconds:
[BP-10489](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10489 ) / [BP-10596](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10596 )


GIVEN 'enable_tickets_beta' is set to true in the remote config console

Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: BetaTix configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "enable_tickets_beta" as true
6. Save changes.
7. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)



GIVEN the downloaded the Ballpark app [iOS]& [ANDROID] 13.0 or greater
AND the user has previously opted into the Beta Ticket views


NOTES:
* THIS ASSUMES LEGACY TICKETS TAB IS DESIRED AS DEFAULTn]
* As of iOS 13.0.0 (3305), TicketsLegacy is defaulted

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has tickets on their acct
WHEN user logs into BP app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Beta TicketTab icon in the bottom NavBar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to TicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Beta TicketTab Upcoming View
AND the ticketed event is shown as a Wallet Card
AND Opt-out link* is present above the Wallet Card 

*Possible Opt-out Link verbiage "Exit the testing program"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps Opt-out link* to return to the Legacy TicketTab Redesign

*Possible Opt-out Link verbiage "Exit the testing program"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Legacy Wallet View
AND the ticketed event is shown as a Wallet Card
AND Opt-in link* is present above the Wallet Card

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta"

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user does NOT have tickets on their acct
AND user's MLB account has been prev verified
WHEN user logs into BP app
and user navigates to TicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown ticket tab highlighted in the bottom navbar
AND user is shown the Beta TicketTab Upcoming View
AND user is shown Upcoming(0) tab [0 being how many total events the consumer has]
AND user is shown Buy Tickets tab [unselected]
AND Opt-out link* is present

*Possible Opt-out Link verbiage "Exit the testing program"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps Opt-out link* to return to the Legacy TicketTab Redesign
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Legacy Wallet View
AND 'Cannot find any ticket's is shown in the middle of the page
AND 'Verify Email Address' and 'Refresh My Tickets' buttons are show (order of buttons are dependent of acct state - verified vs unverified)
AND Opt-in link* is present

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta"

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user does NOT have tickets on their acct
AND user's MLB account has NOT been prev verified
WHEN user logs into BP app
and user navigates to TicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown ticket tab highlighted in the bottom navbar
AND user is shown the Beta TicketTab Upcoming View
AND user is shown Upcoming(0) tab [0 being how many total events the consumer has]
AND user is shown Buy Tickets tab [unselected]
AND user is shown a bottom sheet overlay prompting user to verify their acct
AND Opt-out link* is present

*Possible Opt-out Link verbiage "Exit the testing program"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps Opt-out link* to return to the Legacy TicketTab Redesign
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Legacy Wallet View
AND 'Cannot find any ticket's is shown in the middle of the page
AND 'Verify Email Address' and 'Refresh My Tickets' buttons are show (order of buttons are dependent of acct state - verified vs unverified)
AND Opt-in link* is present

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta"

title: Beta Tickets Tab Toggle Disabled - Legacy view(default) - Opt In NOT shown
custom_preconds:
[BP-10489](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10489 ) / [BP-10596](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10596 )


GIVEN 'enable_tickets_beta' is set to false in the remote config console

Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: BetaTix configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "enable_tickets_beta" as false
6. Save changes.
7. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)



GIVEN the downloaded the Ballpark app [iOS]& [ANDROID] 13.0 or greater

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has tickets on their acct
WHEN user logs into BP app configured to LegacyTicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Legacy TicketTab icon in the bottom NavBar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to TicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Legacy Wallet View
AND the ticketed event is shown as a Wallet Card
AND Opt-in link* is NOT present above the Wallet Card 

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta" (should not be shown)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user does NOT have tickets on their acct
WHEN user logs into BP app configured to LegacyTicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Legacy TicketTab icon in the bottom NavBar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to TicketTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Legacy Wallet View
AND 'Cannot find any ticket's is shown in the middle of the page
AND 'Verify Email Address' and 'Refresh My Tickets' buttons are show (order of buttons are dependent of acct state - verified vs unverified)
AND Opt-in link* is NOT present

*Possible Opt-in Link verbiage "Tired of refreshing? Try the Beta" (should not be shown)

title: ChatBot
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the downloaded the Ballpark app [iOS]& [ANDROID] 13.0 or greater 
AND the user is on Tickets tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Ticket Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown ticket tab w/ 'Tickets' as header
AND user is shown Chatbot icon pinned to upper right corner (similar to a comic speach bubble)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has a question 
When user taps the Chatbot icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown MLB Ballpark Assistant page
AND user is shown Close CTA
AND user is shown Refresh CTA

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user wants to start over with a different Question/Query
WHEN user taps the Refresh CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Chatbot refreshed

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user was able to answer their Question/Query
AND user is done using the Assistant
WHEN user taps the Close CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Chatbot closes 
AND user is returned to Tickets Tab

title: No Upcoming Events - Unverified Account
custom_preconds:
[BAT-82](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-82 )

GIVEN User's account has NOT been previously verified
AND user does NOT have tickets available on their account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Tickets Tab
custom_expected:
THEN user is shown ticket tab highlighted in the bottom navbar
AND user is shown Upcoming(0) tab [0 being how many total events the consumer has]
AND user is shown Buy Tickets tab [unselected]
AND user is shown a bottom sheet overlay prompting user to verify their acct

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Upcoming Tab within TicketsTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown Upcoming(0) tab 
AND 'No upcoming events' is shown above 'Buy Tickets' button

AND user is shown a bottom sheet overlay prompting user to verify their acct
Bottom sheet display:
*Envelope icon w/ '!' show at top
*'Please verify your account' label is bold
*'Tickets purchased or shared will not display until you have verified your email: <current_user_email>' w/ email bold and blue text
*'Resend Email' button 

[Note: the description text may be cutoff w/ ellipses initially, but can be viewed w/ user swipe expansion

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Resend Email' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to shown 'Verification email sent to <current_user_email>'  w/ email shown in blue text

title: No Upcoming Events - Verified Account
custom_preconds:
[BAT-82](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-82 )

GIVEN User's account has been previously verified
AND user does NOT have tickets available on their account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Tickets Tab
custom_expected:
THEN user is shown ticket tab highlighted in the bottom navbar
AND user is shown Upcoming(0) tab [0 being how many total events the consumer has]
AND user is shown Buy Tickets tab [unselected]

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Upcoming Tab within TicketsTab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown Upcoming(0) tab 
AND 'No upcoming events' is shown above 'Buy Tickets' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Buy Tickets' button below 'No upcoming events' label
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to Buy Tickets tab (should become highlighted)

title: Event List and Card View  *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
[BAT-73](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-73 ) / [BPA-7224](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7224 )
[BAT-75](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-75 ) / [BPA-7220](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7220 )
GIVEN User's account has tickets available on their account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Tickets Tab
custom_expected:
THEN user is shown ticket tab highlighted in the bottom navbar
AND user is shown Upcoming(X) [X being how many total events the consumer has]
AND user is shown Buy Tickets tab [unselected]

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Upcoming Tab within TicketsTab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Event Cards will be displayed in the Upcoming section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the event card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN MLB logo is shown at the top left corner of the event card 
AND '...' is shown at the top right corner of the event card (providing options to the user particular to the event)

THEN the event information will contain the event date / time in the format (Ex. Sat, Jun 22 . 1:07 PM ET)
AND beneath the date time will be the Matchup info displayed as Away Team @ Home Team
AND below the Matchup info will be the Event's Venue

THEN the home team's logo will be displayed to the right of the event matchup*

*Team logo not shown for Non-GameEvents (i.e Concerts)

THEN the event card background will be the image as specified in the video poster URL supplied in ticket summary.  [TODO:CONFIRM IF THIS IS STILL RELEVANT]

*If video poster URL is null or an invalid URL, the card background will be the home team's default color.
THEN 'View Tickets' is shown at the bottom of the event card w/ a barcode icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has multiple event tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees the the next upcoming events displayed with individual cards
AND the events will be sorted by date, in ascending order
AND user is able to scroll within the events view

title: Event Card CTAs *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
[BAT-73](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-73 ) / [BPA-7224](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7224 )
[BAT-75](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-75 ) / [BPA-7220](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7220 )

GIVEN user's account has tickets available on their account
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab
custom_steps: WHEN user interacts with the event card
custom_expected:
THEN user is navigated to desired views 
OR is presented options to perform further actions

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Upcoming Tab within TicketsTab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Event Cards will be displayed in the Upcoming section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the event card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN MLB logo is shown at the top left corner of the event card 
AND '...' is shown at the top right corner of the event card (providing options to the user particular to the event)
AND event details are shown containing the event date / time / location
AND 'View Tickets' is shown at the bottom of the event card w/ a barcode icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'View Tickets'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Scanview is shown particular to the event selected

*additional test cases to validate Scanview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'X' to close the Scanview
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Scanview is dismissed 
AND user is returned to Tickets Upcoming Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the event information
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the EventDetails view is shown particular to the event selected

*additional test cases to validate EventDetails View

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'X' to close the EventDetails view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the EventDetails view is dismissed 
AND user is returned to Tickets Upcoming Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps '...' shown at the top right corner of the event card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a menu is presented with different options to the customer*

*different options can be configured based on event/club (TDC v. TM, Sell, Add To Wallet, etc)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps '...' to close the EventDetails view* 


*Note user can also trigger dismissed by taps anywhere off the menu (that does NOT have a CTA)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Event Menu options is dismissed 
AND user is returned to Tickets Upcoming Tab

title: Unverified Acct: Event Card CTAs *[requires tickets, unverified acct]
custom_preconds:
[BP-10470](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10470 ) / [BPA-7298](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7298 )

GIVEN user's account has tickets available on their account
AND user's account has not been verified
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab
custom_steps: WHEN user tabs to the new Tickets Tab Redesign
custom_expected:
THEN user is displayed a 1/4 sheet indicating the verification status 
AND user has the ability to (re)send an account verification email to the email provided
AND user cannot access the ticket scan view until account has been verified

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has unverified acct 
AND user has tickets on the acct
WHEN the user navigates to the Upcoming Tab within TicketsTab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Event Cards will be displayed in the Upcoming section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the event card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN MLB logo is shown at the top left corner of the event card 
AND '...' is shown at the top right corner of the event card (providing options to the user particular to the event)
AND event details are shown containing the event date / time / location
AND 'Please Verify Email' is shown at the bottom of the event card w/ an alert icon (!)


Android: 
(alert icon (!)) Verify Email to Access Tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Please Verify Email'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user cannot access the ticket scan view until account has been verified

THEN user is displayed a 1/4 sheet indicating the verification status 
AND email icon with with '!' shown at the top of the bottom sheet
AND 'Please verify you account' is shown in bold
AND 'Tickets purchased or shared will not display until you have verified your email: ' is shown 
AND the email that user is currently logged into BP app is shown in blue text (bolded)
AND 'Resend Email' button is shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps anywhere above the bottom sheet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the bottom sheet is dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps anywhere on the event card above  'Please Verify Email'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user cannot access the ticket scan view until account has been verified

THEN user is displayed a 1/4 sheet indicating the verification status 
AND email icon with with '!' shown at the top of the bottom sheet
AND 'Please verify you account' is shown in bold
AND 'Tickets purchased or shared will not display until you have verified your email: ' is shown 
AND the email that user is currently logged into BP app is shown in blue text (bolded)
AND 'Resend Email' button is shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swiped down on the bottom sheet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the bottom sheet is dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user is viewing the verification bottom sheet prompt
WHEN user taps 'Resend Email' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 'Verification email sent to <email>'is shown below 'Resend Email' button
AND the email is shown in blue text (not bolded)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates away from and then back to Tickets Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN bottom sheet display maintains state until verification happens

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user verifies the account (via logging into email client and tapping 'Verify Email' button)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user status is refreshed upon dismissing of bottom sheet
AND user's acct is shown to be verified
AND user is able to access Scanview, EventHub, Menu Options

title: Event Menu Options - TDC clubs
custom_preconds:
[BAT-75](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-75 ) / [BPA-7220](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7220 )

GIVEN user's account has TDC tickets available on their account*
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab



User has a Tickets.Com Home Team Event **NOT**
>**Current TM CLUBS - COL, SD, AZ, ATL, TOR, NYY, SEA, CWS**
custom_expected:
User will be See all Options w/ icons under (...):
View Tickets
Ticket Info  
-----------
Share Tickets
Sell Tickets
Add to Wallet (iOS Only?)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has TDC Ticket
AND user is on the TICKETS main page
WHEN the user views the event card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN MLB logo is shown at the top left corner of the event card 
AND '...' is shown at the top right corner of the event card (providing options to the user particular to the event)
AND event details are shown containing the event date / time / location
AND 'View Tickets' is shown at the bottom of the event card w/ a barcode icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps '...' shown at the top right corner of the event card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a menu is presented with different options to the customer*

*different options can be configured based on event/club (TDC v. TM, Sell, Add To Wallet, etc)

AND user should see "View Tickets" as a menu option 
AND user will see icon >

AND user should see "Ticket Info" as a menu option 
AND user will see info icon ('i' in a circle)

AND user should see "Share Tickets"  
AND user will see share icon (arrow starting from center of square pointing up)

AND user should see "Sell Tickets"
AND user will see $ icon ('%' in a circle)

AND user should see "Add to Wallet" 
AND user will see Wallet/Card icon (credit card image)

title: Ticket Scan View (TDC only)  *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's account has TDC tickets available on their account*
AND user has events on account with both single and multiple tickets
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab


User has a Tickets.com Home Team Event **NOT TM**
>**Current TM CLUBS - COL, SD, AZ, ATL, TOR, NYY, SEA, CWS**
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Scanview*


*Scanview can be navigated to via:
**'View Tickets' CTA from Event Card w/in Upcoming Event List
**'View Tickets' from Event Card Menu Option
**Event Card CTA > EventDetails Page 'Access Tickets' CTA 
**'Ticket Info' from Event Card Menu Option > EventDetails Page 'Access Tickets' CTA
**'Share Tickets' from Event Card Menu Option
custom_expected:
THEN the correct Scanview is shown without swiping capability(left/right) and card does not move in ticket scan, if single ticket
OR
THEN the correct Scanview is shown with swiping capability(left/right), if multiple tickets (Android ONLY - also, peeks to additional ticket)



On tap of close X, scan view slides down.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has single ticketed event
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the ticket is centered without any additional tickets peeking, neither to right or left
AND swiping has no effect
AND '1 of 1' is shown below the ticket

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has 2+ ticketed event
And user opens the scan view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the 1st ticket is centered
AND '1 of X' is shown below the ticket (where X is the total amount of tickets)

[ANDROID ONLY]
AND 2nd ticket is peeking in from right

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes the to the left to view the additional tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the 2nd ticket is now centered
AND '2 of X' is shown below the ticket (where X is the total amount of tickets)

[ANDROID ONLY]
AND the 1st ticket is peeking out from the left 
AND additional ticket is peaking out from the right, if additional ticket exists 

** for last card, no card will peek from the right, only cards will peek from left.

title: Scanview: Rotating Barcode *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's account has TDC tickets available on their account*
AND user tickets associated with the account has ticket w/ shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab
AND user accesses the Scanview

User has a Tickets.com Home Team Event **NOT TM**
>**Current TM CLUBS - COL, SD, AZ, ATL, TOR, NYY, SEA, CWS**
custom_expected:
The rotating barcode is activated when there is a shared secret sent from PV (ProVenue) to BoxOffice and down to Ballpark. 
When there is a shared secret in the payload, the client will turn on screenshot protection and rotate the barcode.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time*

*currently barcode is rotating every 5 secs.

custom_steps_separated.content:
[AS ADDITIONAL VALIDATION - YOU CAN USE AN EXTERNAL APP TO VALIDATE THE PAYLOAD] 

WHEN user utilizes a Barcode Scanner application from another device* 
AND user scans the rotating barcode

*Android - 'QR & Barcode Scanner'
*iOS - 'QR Reader'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the payload of the scan is extracted
AND Time-based one-time password (TOTP) value is shown within the payload
AND Timestamp (T) value is shown within the payload

Example:
@TDC=sandbox|BCT=TI|TBN=QB82-K6UMEBER|TSC=LB129|TRW=37|TSE=9|TBT=ADULT|TPC=LB|TEV=9943|SMT=C5|TOTP=29943900|T=1648754505

title: Scanview: Embargoed Barcode (TDC only)  *[requires embargoed tickets]

GIVEN user's account has TDC tickets available on their account*
AND user tickets associated with the account has ticket with embargoed barcode 
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab


User has a Tickets.com Home Team Event **NOT TM**
>**Current TM CLUBS - COL, SD, AZ, ATL, TOR, NYY, SEA, CWS**
custom_steps:
#QA#
sajadul.hussain@mlb.com/ MLBmlb123 have some 2023-08-26 	[22] Barcodes will be available closer to game time.

#PROD#
matthew.weber@mlb.com/ MLBmlb123 has 2023-06-24 	[22] Barcodes will be available closer to game time.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a valid embargoed ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following information is displayed in the scan view header:
On the Left:
*Away Team @ Home Team
*Date, Time (local timezone of the event)
*Venue
On the Right:
*Home team logo

AND the Barcode is NOT shown
AND messaging* is provided to customer 


*messaging potentially - 'Barcode Unavailable - Barcode will display at a later time' OR 'Barcodes will be visible <hrs, i.e 96> hours prior to first pitch."
AND the Sec/Row/Seat are shown

custom_expected:
WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.6AddtoAppleWallet

URLs for determining if a venue allows Apple Wallet (replace 112 with team ID):
http://content.mlb.com/mlb/en/config/v1/112/ballpark/boxoffice_config/web-v1.json (Prod)
http://qacontent.mlb.com/mlb/en/config/v1/137/ballpark/boxoffice_config/web-v1.json (QA)
http://betacontent.mlb.com/mlb/en/config/v1/136/ballpark/boxoffice_config/web-v1.json (Staging)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user is shown the ticket scan view
AND the option to add to apple wallet is available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN add to apple wallet button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the add to apple wallet button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN system apple wallet prompt is displayed
AND ticket can be added to user's apple wallet

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the add to apple wallet button on another ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN system apple wallet prompt is displayed
AND another ticket can be added to user's apple wallet

custom_steps_separated.content: IF the option to add to apple wallet is not available for that venue
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Apple Wallet button is not displayed

title: [iOS ONLY] Scanview: Screenshot Detected (NOT prevented) *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's account has TDC tickets available on their account*
AND user tickets associated with the account has ticket w/ shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab
AND user accesses the Scanview

User has a Tickets.com Home Team Event **NOT TM**
>**Current TM CLUBS - COL, SD, AZ, ATL, TOR, NYY, SEA, CWS**
custom_expected:
*iOS cannot prevent screenshots. Taking a screenshot does not prevent it from being stored in the gallery.
*iOS can detect screenshots and will notify the fan that screenshots will not work when entering the gate.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time*

*currently barcode is rotating every 5 secs.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user attempts to take a screenshot of the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a device prompt is shown with:
*title: 'Foul Ball'
*description: 'Screenshots of your ticket will not be accepted for entry. Please use the app for gate access'
*'OK' as only call-to-action

AND the device allows the screenshot of the ticket (including barcode)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps OK on the Foul Ball prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the prompt is dismissed
AND the ticket scanview is shown

title: [Android ONLY]  Scanview: Screenshot prevented with rotating barcode *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's account has TDC tickets available on their account*
AND user tickets associated with the account has ticket w/ shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice
AND user navigates to the Tickets Tab
AND user accesses the Scanview

User has a Tickets.com Home Team Event **NOT TM**
>**Current TM CLUBS - COL, SD, AZ, ATL, TOR, NYY, SEA, CWS**
custom_expected:
Android notifies the fan when a screenshot is taken and prevent it from being stored in the local gallery.

Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image will be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time*

*currently barcode is rotating every 5 secs.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user attempts to take a screenshot of the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the device notifies the user 'Can't take screenshot due to security policy'

*Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image will be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.

AND the image is prevented from being stored in the local gallery 

*Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image will be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.

title: Ticket Scan View - Tracking [FUTURE RELEASE]

[BP-9663](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9663):Scan View Analytics - Additional context data

AND user's acct has valid tickets in BP
AND the shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for a particular ticketed event

AND the additional context are passed to analytics (for all scan view page views and actions)

*Hometeam ID homeTeam
*gamepk or event ID of the ticket eventID
*Scan state boolean scanned

**Actions for:
*Add to Apple Wallet
*Screenshot and Screenshot Foul Ball (for more detail BP-9640)

custom_steps_separated.expected:

AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified in Charles

*MLB Ballpark : Ticket Scan View 
**id.venue <num> (ex. 2 for Orioles)
**id.homeTeam <num> (ex. 110 for Orioles)

*'OK' as only call-to-action

AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified in Charles

**id.venue <num> (ex. 2 for Orioles)
**id.homeTeam <num> (ex. 110 for Orioles)
**id.event <num> (ex. 663258 for Sat, Sept 24 Astros @ Orioles)
**ticket.hasScanned <true/false>
